requestParams.name: source
requestParams.desc: 请求来源（需调用方自定义标识：OPEN_XXXX）

requestParams.name: warehouse_id
requestParams.desc: 门店或独立仓id   注意：连锁版必填

children.name: type
children.desc:
业务类型（STOCK_CHECK(1, "库存盘点单"),
  STOCK_IN(2, "采购入库单"),
  STOCK_RETURN(3, "退货入库单"),
  STOCK_OUT(4, "出库单")）

children.name: idempotent_no
children.desc: 幂等单号（请求唯一标识）

children.name: source_order_no
children.desc: 用于存储退货入库单关联的订单号（其他单据为业务单号）

children.name: order_biz_type
children.desc:
单据业务类型（  SELL_ONLINE_OUT(41, "网店销售出库"),
  SELL_OFFLINE_OUT(42, "门店销售出库"),）

requestDemos.code:
'SCK180730202933197461', 'source' => 'test', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->post($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
';

token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['business_order_no']="SCK180730202933197461"
params['source']="test"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.stock.stockout.get', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)
